definition: appreciably or disagreeably cold, very hot and finely tapering pepper of special pungency
details:
adjective
- appreciably or disagreeably cold
= synonyms: parky
- not characterized by emotion
= example: not characterized by emotion
- lacking warmth of feeling
= example: lacking warmth of feeling
noun
- very hot and finely tapering pepper of special pungency
= synonyms: chili, chili pepper, chilli, chile
